sentences.en: All Dreamland's electric blankets are guaranteed for three years.
sentences.cn: 所有的梦乡牌电热毯质保3年。

sentences.en: Bronka is somewhat infamous for his screeching electric guitar work.
sentences.cn: 布朗卡因为弹出刺耳的电吉他声而有些让人讨厌。

sentences.en: Electric whisks should be used on a slow speed.
sentences.cn: 使用自动搅拌器时应该选用慢挡。

sentences.en: Fans of electric cars say they are clean, quiet and economical.
sentences.cn: 电动汽车迷们说，电动车清洁、无噪音而且经济。

sentences.en: He cools himself in front of an electric fan.
sentences.cn: 他在电扇前让自己凉快些。

sentences.en: He passed an electric spark through a mixture of gases.
sentences.cn: 他让一束电火花穿过了一团混合气体。

sentences.en: Hybrids, unlike pure electric cars, never need to be plugged in.
sentences.cn: 与纯电动汽车不同，混合动力车永远不需要接电源。

sentences.en: In an electric power plant the heat converts water into high-pressure steam.
sentences.cn: 在发电厂里，热能将水转化成高压蒸汽。

sentences.en: She emptied both their mugs and switched on the electric kettle.
sentences.cn: 她把他们俩的杯子倒空，烧上了电水壶。

sentences.en: The company, New England Electric, burns coal to generate power.
sentences.cn: 新英格兰电力公司用煤发电。

sentences.en: The electric-power industry is gun-shy about building more large plants.
sentences.cn: 电力行业对新建大型电厂十分谨慎。

sentences.en: The grand piano has been replaced with a small, inelegant electric model.
sentences.cn: 三角钢琴被代之以一架粗鄙的小电子琴。

sentences.en: The racket of drills and electric saws went on past midnight.
sentences.cn: 钻孔机和电锯的噪声过了半夜还继续响着。

sentences.en: This forms the basis for our mathematical expression for the electric field.
sentences.cn: 这是电场数学表达式的基础。

sentences.en: Water and electric hook-ups are available and facilities are good.
sentences.cn: 水和电都可以接通，设施也很不错。

words.tran_cn: 电力；电流；强烈的紧张情绪
使电气化；使充电；使触电；使激动

phrases.tran_cn: 电设备；电器设备，用电设备；电气设备；电器类

trans.tran_cn: 用电的，电的，通电的，扣人心弦的，电动的
trans.tran_en: needing electricity to work, produced by electricity, or used for carrying electricity
